abstract: Democracy activists say some North Koreans reacted with anger and derision in secretly watching Sony Pictures movie The Interview, about fictional plot to assassinated leader Kim Jong-un; point out few will risk seeing film but those who did had wounded feelings over their sense of national pride.
lead_paragraph: Several democracy activists with contacts in the North said the North Koreans they spoke with reacted to the film with derision and wounded feelings over the depiction of their country.
snippet: Several democracy activists with contacts in the North said the North Koreans they spoke with reacted to the film with derision and wounded feelings over the depiction of their country.

headline.main: Disliking Kim Jong-un, and ‘The Interview’ Even More
headline.print_headline: Disliking Kim Jong-un, and Film Even More
